summary: Tested Beauty Spa Management Module - All 10 pages load correctly, backend APIs 100% working (31/31 tests passed), fixed 2 SelectItem empty value bugs in ClientsPage.js and POSPage.js

console_warnings.issue: React key warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' for ID aa519114-0295-4856-9406-30f2f5853610

fixed_bugs.issue: SelectItem with empty value causing runtime error
fixed_bugs.fix: Changed value='' to value='all' with proper handler

fixed_bugs.issue: SelectItem with empty value for walk-in client causing runtime error
fixed_bugs.fix: Changed value='' to value='walk-in' with proper handler

critical_code_review_comments: All Beauty Spa pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Backend API is well-structured with proper error handling
Multi-currency support (SRD, EUR, USD) implemented in POS
Surinamese payment methods (Telesur Pay, Finabank QR, Hakrinbank QR) supported
React useEffect dependency warnings present but not critical (eslint warnings)
seed_data_creation: Created test data via backend tests: clients, treatments, staff, products, appointments, sales, vouchers, queue items
context_for_next_testing_agent: Beauty Spa module fully tested. All 10 submodules working: Dashboard, Clients (CRM), Appointments, Treatments, POS, Products, Staff, Queue, Reports, Vouchers. Backend has 31 passing tests. Two SelectItem bugs were fixed. The module uses /api/beautyspa/* endpoints.

pages_tested.beautyspa_dashboard: PASSED - Shows stats: clients, appointments, revenue, treatments, staff, products
pages_tested.beautyspa_clients: PASSED - CRM with search, filter by membership, CRUD operations
pages_tested.beautyspa_treatments: PASSED - Treatment management with categories, pricing, duration
pages_tested.beautyspa_appointments: PASSED - Appointment scheduling with status management
pages_tested.beautyspa_pos: PASSED - Point of Sale with cart, payment methods, vouchers
pages_tested.beautyspa_products: PASSED - Inventory management with stock tracking
pages_tested.beautyspa_staff: PASSED - Staff management with roles, specializations, commission
pages_tested.beautyspa_reports: PASSED - Revenue, treatments, products, staff, clients reports
